EmailTemplate.subject: REMINDER - Invite to cocktail reception in San Francisco (Sept. 25)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}},
Just a quick reminder that we're hosting a night of drinks, awesome food and great company with some of the most influential tech leaders in San Francisco, and you're invited.
Please join us for a cocktail reception at Town Hall Restaurant on Thursday, September 25, 2014 at 6 p.m.
Reply to this email to RSVP. This is an invite-only event.
If you canâ€™t make it, please feel free to recommend someone else who could attend in your place. Looking forward to seeing you there!
Date: Thursday, September 25, 2014 Time: 6 p.m. - 9 p.m. PT Location: Patio at Town Hall Restaurant 342 Howard St, San Francisco, CA 94105
Regards, Michael
Michael Kahn Director, Business Development Pivotal Labs
